articles.title: Russia ramping up production of 'most powerful' weapons: Medvedev - CNA
articles.description: MOSCOW: Russia's ex-president Dmitry Medvedev said on Sunday (Dec 11) the country was ramping up production of new-generation weapons to protect itself from enemies in Europe, the United States and Australia.

articles.title: PM Lee to officiate launch of RSN submarines in Germany, attend ASEAN-EU summit in Brussels - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong will make an official visit to Germany this week, as well as attend the ASEAN-European Union (EU) commemorative summit in Brussels. He will visit Kiel on Monday (Dec 12) and Tuesday, where he will meet German Chancell…

articles.title: Russia welcomes India's stand to not support G7's price cap on crude oil | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Group of Seven major powers, the European Union and Australia last week agreed to a $60 per barrel price cap on Russian seaborne crude oil
articles.content: Russia has welcomed India's decision to not support the price cap on Russian oil announced by the G7 countries and their allies. Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak made the statement durin… [+3153 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Morocco down Portugal to become first ever African World Cup semi-finalists - EWN
articles.description: The Atlas Lions, also the first Arab team to make the last four, added Portugal to their list of European scalps with a resolute second-half performance.
articles.content:
